mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, u.nickname AS writerName, s.create_date AS createDate, (SELECT img_url FROM tb_shopimg WHERE id = s.id AND main_img = 'Y' LIMIT 1) AS mainImgUrl FROM tb_shop s LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.req_type IS NULL ORDER BY s.create_date DESC

SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, u.nickname AS writerName, s.create_date AS createDate, (SELECT img_url FROM tb_shopimg WHERE id = s.id AND main_img = 'Y' LIMIT 1) AS mainImgUrl FROM tb_shop s LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.req_type IS NULL ORDER BY s.create_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_shop WHERE req_type IS NULL
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(id, 3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) FROM tb_shop WHERE id LIKE 'RS%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shop (id, name, address, content, user_id, create_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{address}, #{content}, #{userId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO tb_shopdetail (id, contents, user_id, create_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{contents}, #{userId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO tb_shopimg (id, img_seq, img_url, main_img, create_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{imgSeq}, #{imgUrl}, #{mainImg}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT img_seq FROM tb_shopimg WHERE id = #{id} AND main_img = 'Y' ORDER BY img_seq ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT img_seq FROM tb_shopimg WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY img_seq ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.address AS address, s.content AS content, u.nickname AS writerName FROM tb_shop s LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id WHERE s.id = #{id}
SELECT img_seq AS imgSeq, img_url AS imgUrl, main_img AS mainImg FROM tb_shopimg WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY img_seq ASC
SELECT c.name FROM tb_shopdetail sd JOIN tb_category c ON sd.contents = c.id WHERE sd.id = #{id}
